{{Infobox Embedded System |image1 = <!-- Image filename --> |image1_size = <!-- Image size, ex.150px --> |caption = VeloCloud EDGE 5X0 |caption2 = <!-- 2nd tagleine --> |pp = <!-- product page url only --> |sp = <!-- Support page url only --> |dl = <!-- Download page url only --> |wikidevi = <!-- wikidevi.wi-cat.ru page, included underscores --> |wikipedia = <!-- [[wikipedia:Main Page|Wikipedia]] Leave blank for none --> |ddwrtsupport = <!-- Activation, Donation, Incompatible, Not Supported, Partial Support, Supported, TBD, Unofficially, WIP --> |openwrtsupport = <!-- Incompatible, Not Supported, Partial Support, Supported, WIP, Unofficially, --> |tomatosupport = <!-- Incompatible, Not Supported, Partial Support, Supported, WIP, Unofficially, --> |gargoylesupport = <!-- Incompatible, Not Supported, Partial Support, Supported, WIP, Unofficially, -->
|brand = VeloCloud |model = EDGE |submodelappend = yes |submodel = 540-AC (5X0) |revision = <!-- Model Revision, Leave blank for none or unknown --> |subrevision = <!-- Model Subrevision, Leave blank for none or unknown --> |model_part_num = |page_start_date = |page_start_origon = |wlclass = AC1750 |series = <!-- Device series --> |type = SD-WAN Router, wireless router |sernum = <!-- First 4 or so for easy version identification --> |fcc_id = TK4WLE900VX |icid = <!-- Industry Canada Identification number, Leave blank for unknown --> |us_id = <!-- US ID number --> |boardid = 80100-0111-F500 |ecc_id = <!-- eec-id -->
|cpu1chip1 = Intel Atom;C2558; |cpu1_cores = 4 |cpu1_type = x86-64 |cpu1_type_rev = <!-- x86-64 Revision, Leave blank for unknown --> |cpu1spd = 2.4 GHz |is_doc = |bus = <!-- 8-bit, 16-bit, 32-bit, 64-bit, Leave blank for none -->
|flash1type = <!-- Parallel,Serial(SPI),SPI NOR,NAND,Compact Flash, --> |fla1_num = <!-- 1,2,3,4 --> |fla1chip = Samsung;KLM8G1GETF-B041; |flash1size = 8 GiB |flash1maxsize = <!-- Maximum size firmware can be in bytes --> |flash2type = CMOS Serial |fla2_num = <!-- 1,2,3,4 --> |fla2chip = Winbond;W25Q64JVSIQ; |flash2size = 8 |flash2maxsize = <!-- Maximum size firmware can be in bytes -->
|ram1type = DDR3L |ram1type1 = SDRAM |ram1spd = <!-- RAM speed --> |ram1size = 8 GiB |ram1chip = Kingston;D5128EETBPGGBU; |ram1_num = 18 |nvramsize = <!-- 32, 60, 64, etc... in kb, Leave blank for unknown -->
|eth_cpu = true |eth2chip = Intel;NH1350AM2; |eth3chip = Marvell;88E1514; |eth4chip = Marvell;88E1514; |sw1chip = Marvell;88E6176; |sw2chip = Marvell;88E6176; |dsl_ports = |voip_ports = |wan_ports = 4 |wan_speed = 1GbE |lan_ports = 8 |lan_speed = 1GbE |ethstandard = <!-- auto --> |portbasedvlan = <!-- Support for port based vlan tagging, Leave blank for unknown --> |802.1qvlan = <!-- Support for 802.1q vlan tagging, Leave blank for unknown --> |auto_mdix = <!-- mdix support --> |sup_jumbo = <!-- Jumbo frames support --> |ethoui = F0:8E:DB |oui = 04:F0:21
|bootwait = <!-- On or Off, Leave blank for unknown --> |stockbootloader = Grub;2.02;; |stockos = Linux;3.14.79;VeloCloud OS (OpenWrt derivative?);
|exp_if_types = Mini PCIe, USB 3.0, USB 2.0, SFP (GBIC), SIM Card slot |exp_sim_num = 2 |exp_pcmcia_num = <!-- Number of pcmcia ports, Leave blank for none --> |exp_expcard_num = <!-- Number of Expresscard ports, Leave blank for none --> |exp_minipci_num = <!-- Number of Mini PCI Slots, Leave blank for none --> |exp_minipcie_num = 3 |exp_usb_num = 4 |exp_cf_num = <!-- Number Compact Flash Slots, Leave blank for none --> |exp_sdmmc_num = <!-- Number SD/MMC Slots, Leave blank for none --> |exp_ide_num = <!-- Number of ide ports, Leave blank for none --> |exp_ata_num = <!-- Number of ATA Ports, Leave blank for none --> |exp_sata_num = <!-- Number of sata ports, Leave blank for none --> |exp_esata_num = <!-- Number of esata ports, Leave blank for none --> |exp_parallel = <!-- Number of parallel ports, Leave blank for none --> |exp_sfp_num = 2 |exp_M.2 = <!-- Number of M.2 ports, Leave blank for none --> |usb_hub = <!-- USB hub compatibility -->
|pwr_volt_type = VDC |pwr_vdc = 12 |pwr_amp_dc = 5 |pwr_conn = barrel |pwr_barrel_outer = 5.5 |pwr_barrel_inner = 2.1 |pwr_barrel_len = 9.5 |pwr_pol = <!-- Connector polarity -->
|serial = yes,, USB Female Mini-B,, (115200 8N1) |jtag = <!-- Full JTAG info -->
|specialfeat = <!-- Features that don't fit any place else, Leave blank for none --> |flags = SFP, 2x SIM Card slot, RTC w/ battery, heatsink, fan, TPM |addchip = Trusted Platform Module;Infineon;SLB 9965TT2.0;;1;,,, 2-Port USB 3.0 xHCI Host Controller;TI;TUSB7320;;1;,,, Ultra Fast USB 2.0 Flash Media Controller;SMSC;USB2244;;1;,,, Single-Chip USB-to-UART Bridge;Silicon Labs;CP2102;;1;,,, Dual RPM-Based PWM Fan Controller;SMSC;EMC2104;;1;,,, 8-bit Fast Mode Plus I2C-bus LED driver;NXP;PCA9634;;1;,,, 5-Output 1.5V PCIe Gen1-2-3 Fanout Buffer;Renesas;9DBU0531;;1;,,, Synchronous PWM Switching Converter;OnSemi;NCP3170;;4;,,, 256K-bit SPI Serial CMOS EEPROM;OnSemi;CAT25256;;2;,,, 8-Bit I2C and SMBus I/O Port w/reset;NXP;PCA9557;;2;,,, 8-Pin MCU w/High-Precision 16-Bit PWM;Microchip;PIC12L1571;;1;,,, 2 Channel 1A USB Power Distribution Switch;TI;TPS2066;;1;,,, Single-Phase Synchronous Buck Regulator w/Power MOSFET;OnSemi;NCP81109F;;3;,,, 9A Single-Input Voltage Synchronous Buck Regulator;International Rectifier;IR3899;;3;,,, Hex Buffer and Driver w/Open-Drain Output;TI;SN74LVC07A;;1;,,, 3.3V 4-Bit 2-Port Bus Switch;Pericom;PI3C3126;;1;,,, 3A LDO Regulator;Richtek;RT9018B;;1; |802dot11_protocols = abgn+ac
|defaulip = <!-- ???.???.???.???, default IP Address --> |defaultlogin = <!-- default Login Name, Leave blank for unknown --> |defaultpass = <!-- default Password, Leave blank for unknown --> |defaultssid = <!-- default Wireless ID, Leave blank for unknown --> |defaultssid_regex = |default_ch = <!-- Defaults channel(s) Radio(s) are set to --> |manuf = <!-- Manufacturer --> |manuf_model = <!-- Manufacturer Model --> |manuf_rev = <!-- Manufacturer Revision --> |is_manuf = No |tpfirmware = <!-- Third party firmware official support, AsusWRT-Merlin, CeroWrt, DD-WRT, DD-WRT (kong), DD-WRT (kongac), DD-WRT (kongarm), FreedomBox, FreshTomato-ARM, Gargoyle, LibreWrt, Oleg (wl500g), Oleg-ng (wl500g), OpenWrt, Tomato, Tomato RAF, Tomato (shibby), Tomato (Toastman), TomatoUSB, Wive-NG -->
|availability = <!-- Market availability --> |eoldate = <!-- End of Life date --> |fccapprovdate = 06/10/2015 |estreldate = <!-- Estimated release date --> |estprice = <!-- Estimated retail price in US dollars --> |upc = <!-- UPC number --> |ean = <!-- EAN number --> |dx_sku = <!-- DealExtreme sku --> |newegg = <!-- newegg item number --> |asin = <!-- ASIN number --> |asin_country = <!-- ASIN country --> |asin2 = <!-- ASIN number --> |asin_country2 = <!-- ASIN country --> |countrymanuf = China
|buttons = <!-- buttons available --> |led = <!-- Led colors and descriptions --> |dimensions = <!-- Size of device {{convert |length|x|widthordepth|x|height|in|mm}} --> |weight = <!-- Weight of device {{convert|weight|oz|g}} -->
|wi1_if_name = |rad1mod = Compex WLE900VX |rad1modif = Mini PCIe |rad1chip1 = Qualcomm Atheros;QCA9880;QCA9880-BR4A; |rad1oui = <!-- Only if different from above OUI --> |rad1_ant_conn = U.FL |rad1txchains = 3 |rad1rxchains = 3 |rad1sstreams = 3 |rad1stand = IEEE 802.11a/b/g/n/ac |acqam1 = <!-- AC-qam --> |rad1ac = 1300 |nqam1 = <!-- 600, 800, 900, 1000, --> |rad1n = 450/450 |rad1g = 54 |rad1b = 11 |rad1a = 54 |rad1freq = 2.4 or 5
}}{{TIDTOC|embedded}} ==Overview== ===Hardware specification=== *CPU: [[Intel Atom]] C2558 (Quad-core @2.4GHz) *Memory: 8GB (DDR3L) SDRAM ([[Samsung]] KLM8G1GETF) *Storage: 8MB CMOS Serial Flash, :8GB Samsung Flash via USB *Network: 10x Gigabit Ethernet ports, 2x Gigabit SFP ports *Wi-Fi: [[Qualcomm Atheros]] QCA9880 (802.11abgn/ac) *USB: 2x USB 3.0 ports, 2x USB 2.0 ports *PCI: 3x PCIe (1 used by Wi-Fi) *Power: 12V, 5A via barrel
==Links of Interest== :[https://wan.velocloud.com/rs/098-RBR-178/images/sdwan-712-edge-platform-spec-ds-1020.pdf Platform Specs]
==Pictures== <center>'''User Images''' <gallery mode="slideshow"> File:VeloCloud EDGE 5X0 Top.jpeg|Board Top File:VeloCloud EDGE 5X0 Bottom.jpeg|Board Bottom File:VeloCloud EDGE 5X0 Internal.jpeg|Internal View </gallery></center>[[Has images::internal| ]]
